inventory.helpMessage:
To view your character's inventory, simply type:
=-inventory

characterSheet.helpMessage:
To view your character's info sheet, simply type:
=-characterSheet

mememe.helpMessage:
Meme me! Create memes on the go from any device! Just type:
=-mememe <text to meme>

unknownCommand.helpMessage: Unknown command! Try using the '=-help' command for help.

help.helpMessage: Help command does not need any arguments. Just type '=-help'
